tasks.title: Implement FOIA Data Upload Interface
tasks.description: Create a web interface for uploading CSV/Excel files containing FOIA data with column mapping capabilities to populate existing database schema
tasks.details: Build React component using react-dropzone for file upload (leverage existing React frontend infrastructure), implement CSV/Excel parsing using Papa Parse or similar library, create dynamic column mapping interface where users can map uploaded columns to existing database fields (zoned_by_right, occupancy_class, fire_sprinklers), add file validation and preview functionality, integrate with Supabase Storage for secure file handling (use existing Supabase connection from .env)
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for file parsing functions, integration tests for upload flow with existing Supabase connection, validation tests for different file formats and edge cases, user acceptance testing with sample FOIA datasets against 701,089 existing parcels

subtasks.title: Create File Upload UI Component
subtasks.description: Build React component with drag-and-drop file upload interface using react-dropzone, supporting CSV and Excel files with progress indicators and file validation
subtasks.details: Implement drag-and-drop zone using react-dropzone library, add file type validation for CSV/Excel formats, create upload progress indicators, implement file size limits and error handling, add file preview functionality showing first few rows, integrate with existing React frontend styling

subtasks.title: Implement File Parsing Logic
subtasks.description: Develop parsing functionality for CSV and Excel files using Papa Parse or similar library to extract data into structured format
subtasks.details: Integrate Papa Parse for CSV parsing with configurable delimiters, implement Excel parsing using appropriate library, handle various encoding formats (UTF-8, Latin-1), create data structure for parsed content, add error handling for malformed files, implement streaming for large files

subtasks.title: Build Column Mapping Interface
subtasks.description: Create dynamic UI for mapping uploaded file columns to existing database schema fields (zoned_by_right, occupancy_class, fire_sprinklers)
subtasks.details: Build dropdown interfaces for column mapping to database fields, implement auto-detection of column matches based on headers, create preview table showing mapped data, add validation for required field mappings, implement mapping presets for common FOIA formats, allow custom field mapping persistence

subtasks.title: Implement Data Validation System
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive validation logic for uploaded FOIA data against existing database constraints and business rules
subtasks.details: Implement field-level validation (valid zoning codes, occupancy classes, boolean values), create data quality checks and error reporting, build validation summary dashboard, add support for custom validation rules, implement batch validation for large datasets, create validation report export functionality

subtasks.title: Integrate with Supabase Storage and Database
subtasks.description: Connect upload interface to Supabase for secure file storage and database integration using existing connection credentials
subtasks.details: Reference the schema and database architecture in @README.md before beginning the build. Integrate with Supabase Storage for secure file uploads using existing .env credentials, implement database insertion logic for validated FOIA data, create transaction handling for batch operations, add rollback functionality for failed imports, implement progress tracking for large uploads, ensure integration with existing 701,089 parcel database structure

tasks.title: Enhance Address Matching System (Right-Sized for Startup)
tasks.description: Incrementally improve existing address matching to solve the real 26% Fort Worth match rate problem with startup-appropriate engineering
tasks.details: RIGHT-SIZED APPROACH: Address real business problem with minimal complexity. Current 26% match rate with Fort Worth FOIA needs improvement. FOCUS ON: (1) Enhanced parcel number extraction for Texas county formats (Fort Worth PB01-02745, etc.), (2) Simple pg_trgm fuzzy matching for database performance, (3) Improved manual review interface for bulk operations. SKIP OVER-ENGINEERING: Geospatial matching, ML models, complex caching - add only if proven necessary after Phase 2A success.
tasks.testStrategy: Target 40-60% match rate improvement with Fort Worth FOIA data, maintain sub-25ms query performance, validate enhanced parcel number extraction with real Texas FOIA formats, usability testing for manual review improvements

startupContext.currentProblem: 26% match rate with Fort Worth FOIA data due to address format mismatches
startupContext.rootCause: Address normalization insufficient: 'E LANCASTER AVE' vs 'LANCASTER', suite numbers, directionals
startupContext.businessGoal: Increase match rate to 80%+ through enhanced address normalization (not parcel extraction)
startupContext.engineeringPrinciple: Address the real problem: format differences, not missing data
startupContext.keyInsight: Parcel DB contains all Texas addresses - 26% rate reveals normalization gaps, not data gaps
existingAssets: 1.4M+ parcel database with ALL Texas addresses

subtasks.title: Enhanced Address Normalization Engine (Phase 2A Priority)
subtasks.description: Fix address format mismatches to solve the 26% match rate problem - target 80%+ match rate
subtasks.details: ROOT CAUSE IDENTIFIED: 26% match rate is due to address format differences, not missing parcels. FOIA addresses like '7445 E LANCASTER AVE' vs parcel '223 LANCASTER'. SOLUTION: Enhanced address normalization in foia_address_matcher.py: (1) Remove suite numbers (STE 200, STE 106, #7166), (2) Standardize directionals (E LANCASTER AVE → LANCASTER), (3) Normalize street types (AVE ↔ AVENUE), (4) Handle business addresses. Test with fort-worth-foia-test.csv. Expected outcome: 26% → 80%+ match rate.

subtasks.title: Basic pg_trgm Fuzzy Matching (Phase 2A)
subtasks.description: Add simple PostgreSQL fuzzy matching to improve address matching without complex infrastructure
subtasks.details: LIGHTWEIGHT IMPLEMENTATION: Install pg_trgm extension in Supabase. Create basic trigram similarity queries for addresses. Replace most compute-intensive Python fuzzy matching with database queries. Keep implementation simple - no complex indexing strategies initially. Maintain current <25ms performance. Test with existing 1.4M parcel database to ensure no regression.

subtasks.title: Improved Manual Review Interface (Phase 2A)
subtasks.description: Enhance existing manual review UI for better bulk operations to handle the 74% unmatched records
subtasks.details: PRACTICAL UI IMPROVEMENTS: Enhance existing AddressMatchingValidator.tsx component. Add bulk approval/rejection buttons, confidence score filtering, simple side-by-side address comparison. Focus on improving workflow for reviewing unmatched Fort Worth FOIA records. No complex features like Google Maps or reviewer assignment initially. Integration with existing Task 1.5 audit workflow.

tasks.title: Create FOIA Property Filtering System
tasks.description: Add advanced filtering capabilities to existing property search based on FOIA data fields (zoning, occupancy class, fire sprinklers)
tasks.details: Extend existing search API to include FOIA filters leveraging current sub-25ms performance, verify existing database indexes on zoned_by_right, occupancy_class, and fire_sprinklers columns (add if missing), create React filter components with dropdowns and checkboxes using existing React frontend architecture, implement filter state management using React Query, add filter persistence in URL parameters for shareable searches, maintain existing sub-25ms query performance standards
tasks.testStrategy: Performance tests to ensure filtering maintains existing <25ms speed requirements, functional tests for all filter combinations against 701,089 parcel dataset, UI tests for filter component interactions with existing search interface, database query optimization validation maintaining current performance benchmarks

subtasks.title: Database Schema Validation & Index Optimization
subtasks.description: Verify existing database indexes on FOIA fields and optimize for filtering performance
subtasks.details: Check existing indexes on zoned_by_right, occupancy_class, fire_sprinklers columns in 701,089 parcel database. Create missing indexes if needed. Test query performance with realistic filter combinations. Ensure sub-25ms query times maintained. Document index strategy for production deployment.
subtasks.testStrategy: Query performance benchmarks, EXPLAIN ANALYZE on filter combinations, load testing with 701k records

subtasks.title: Extend Search API with FOIA Filters
subtasks.description: Add FOIA filter parameters to existing search endpoints while maintaining performance
subtasks.details: Extend existing search API endpoints to accept fire_sprinklers, zoned_by_right, occupancy_class filter parameters. Implement efficient WHERE clause generation. Add filter validation and sanitization. Maintain backward compatibility with existing search functionality. Test with existing Supabase client integration.
subtasks.testStrategy: API endpoint testing, parameter validation, performance regression testing, backward compatibility verification

subtasks.title: React Filter Components
subtasks.description: Create reusable React components for FOIA property filtering with modern UI patterns
subtasks.details: Build FilterPanel component with dropdowns for occupancy_class, checkboxes for fire_sprinklers, radio buttons for zoned_by_right. Use existing shadcn/ui components for consistency. Implement real-time search preview. Add filter reset and clear functionality. Ensure mobile responsive design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Component unit tests, visual regression testing, mobile responsiveness, accessibility compliance

subtasks.title: Filter State Management & URL Persistence
subtasks.description: Implement robust state management for filters with URL synchronization for shareable searches
subtasks.details: Integrate React Query for filter state management. Implement URL parameter serialization/deserialization for all filter combinations. Add browser history support for filter navigation. Create shareable filter URLs. Handle edge cases like invalid filter combinations gracefully.
subtasks.testStrategy: State management testing, URL parameter validation, browser history testing, edge case handling

subtasks.title: Integration with Existing Search Interface
subtasks.description: Seamlessly integrate FOIA filters with the current property search interface
subtasks.details: Integrate FilterPanel with existing search results table. Update search results display to show FOIA data columns. Add filter indicators and active filter badges. Implement filter count display. Ensure smooth UX transitions between filtered and unfiltered states.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration testing with existing search, UX flow testing, visual consistency validation

tasks.title: Build Data Validation and Conflict Resolution Tools
tasks.description: Implement tools for validating FOIA data quality and resolving matching conflicts with existing parcel database
tasks.details: Create validation rules for FOIA data fields using existing database schema constraints (valid zoning codes, occupancy classes, boolean fire sprinkler values), build conflict resolution interface for reviewing low-confidence matches against existing 701,089 parcels, implement data quality metrics dashboard, add bulk approval/rejection tools for match results, create audit trail for all data changes, implement rollback functionality for import operations, use existing Python virtual environment and dependencies
tasks.testStrategy: Validation rule tests with known good/bad data from existing parcel database, conflict resolution workflow testing with real parcel data, audit trail verification, rollback functionality testing against production-like dataset, data integrity checks maintaining existing database performance

tasks.title: Enhance Property Search Interface with FOIA Integration
tasks.description: Update the existing property search interface to display and filter by FOIA data fields integrated with current 701,089 parcel database
tasks.details: Modify existing property search results table to include FOIA columns (zoning, occupancy, sprinklers), add visual indicators for properties with/without FOIA data, implement advanced search form with FOIA-specific filters using existing React components, add search result sorting by FOIA criteria, create property detail modal with comprehensive FOIA information display leveraging existing UI patterns, maintain responsive design for mobile use consistent with current interface
tasks.testStrategy: UI component tests for new search features integrated with existing interface, integration tests for search API changes maintaining current performance, mobile responsiveness testing consistent with existing design, accessibility compliance testing, user experience testing with real estate team using existing 701,089 parcel dataset

tasks.title: Implement Interactive Map with FOIA Visualization
tasks.description: Enhance the existing Mapbox integration to display properties with FOIA data visualization and clustering for 701,089 parcels
tasks.details: Extend existing Mapbox GL integration to show FOIA data in property markers, implement color-coded markers based on zoning/occupancy status, add property clustering with FOIA data aggregation optimized for large dataset performance, create map popup with detailed property and FOIA information, implement map-based filtering controls, add legend for FOIA data visualization, optimize map performance for 701,089 parcel dataset maintaining existing performance standards
tasks.testStrategy: Map rendering performance tests with full 701,089 parcel dataset, marker clustering validation at scale, popup functionality testing, mobile map interaction testing consistent with existing interface, large dataset rendering tests maintaining current performance benchmarks

tasks.title: Create User Authentication and Role Management
tasks.description: Implement user authentication system with role-based access control for team collaboration features using existing Supabase infrastructure
tasks.details: Set up Supabase Auth with email/password authentication using existing Supabase connection from .env, create user roles (admin, team_lead, analyst), implement Row Level Security policies for data access leveraging existing RLS-enabled database, build login/registration components using existing React frontend architecture, create user management interface for admins, implement role-based UI component rendering, add password reset functionality, set up user session management
tasks.testStrategy: Authentication flow testing with existing Supabase infrastructure, role permission validation against existing RLS policies, RLS policy testing with current database setup, security testing for unauthorized access attempts, session management testing integrated with existing system

tasks.title: Build Property Assignment and Progress Tracking System

tasks.details: Create user_assignments table with database triggers in existing PostgreSQL schema, build property assignment interface with user selection dropdown using existing React components, implement assignment status tracking (assigned, in_progress, completed), create team dashboard showing workload distribution across existing parcel database, add assignment history and audit logging, implement bulk assignment operations optimized for large dataset, create notification system for assignment updates
tasks.testStrategy: Assignment workflow testing with existing parcel database, database trigger validation maintaining current performance, team dashboard functionality testing with 701,089 parcel scale, bulk operation testing optimized for existing database performance, notification delivery testing

tasks.title: Develop Analytics Dashboard for Property and Team Insights
tasks.description: Create comprehensive analytics dashboard showing property distribution, FOIA data coverage, and team performance metrics for existing 701,089 parcel database
tasks.details: Create materialized views for analytics queries optimized for existing database performance, build charts using Chart.js or similar library showing property distribution by county/city from existing data, FOIA data coverage percentages across 701,089 parcels, team productivity metrics, implement real-time dashboard updates using Supabase subscriptions with existing connection, add customizable date ranges and filters, create export functionality for reports, optimize analytics queries maintaining sub-25ms performance standards

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Testing and Documentation
tasks.description: Create full test coverage and update documentation for the FOIA integration features integrated with existing system architecture
tasks.details: Write comprehensive unit tests for all new components and functions using existing testing framework, create integration tests for FOIA data workflows with existing 701,089 parcel database, implement end-to-end tests using Playwright or similar maintaining existing performance standards, update PROJECT_MEMORY.md with new database schema changes preserving existing documentation, create user documentation for FOIA features, write API documentation for new endpoints, set up automated testing in CI/CD pipeline, create performance benchmarking tests maintaining sub-25ms query requirements
